reviews.review: Infinity war took the risks we have been wanting to see from marvel, and it delivered.
It was perfect! Everything about the movie was amazing. The choreography, visual effects the fight scenes and the story line.

An epic movie which actually lives up to it's own hype!  I was absolutely blown away by it and will be going back to see it at least once more!  Do not let anyone spoil the details for you and you will get the most out of it when you see it.
I literally dont know how to feel right now. No other movie has made feel the stress and emotions that this movie did. I mean that in a good way.

This movie is just astonishing...there are no words to describe it.
Avoid all spoilers and see this movie ASAP!!
No one is prepared for this movie

They've been building this movie up for 10 years and it absolutely lives up to the hype. It keeps that typical Marvel quipping and humor but still manages to keep the stakes high and not take away from the dark, action-packed tone. Whatever character you're a fan of, you won't be disappointed. Every character gets a chance to shine (SPOILER AHEAD) unless you're a Hawkeye or Ant Man fan.

Phenomenal. That is the word I would use. Full of action, humor, and heartbreak, this movie accomplishes the impossible and delivers on Marvel's promise. Do not be mistaken, this is very much Thanos' movie so do not expect things to go well for our heroes. The film is fast paced, it expects you to keep up, it does not have time to slow down and hold your hand through it's runtime. Also, comic book fans should know, the storyline in Infinity War is very loosely based on the storyline from Infinity Gaunlet in the comics. Notice how I said "very loosely," this is not a copy and paste story directly from the comics. It is its own story with the heroes and the villain all having different character arcs, some of which you would not expect. The movie ends on such a high note as well, leaving you wanting for it's untitled sequel to come out tomorrow rather than next year. Absolutely phenomenal.
This is epic movie of marvel cinematic universe.
It gave me 99% of everything I wanted, and then gave me a whole bunch more I never dreamed I would get.
